text: "Subdivisions" is a 1982 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the second single from their ninth studio album Signals. It was released as a single and gets played regularly on classic rock radio stations and appears on several greatest hits albums. It went to number 5 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Track charts. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Synth rock songs
title: Subdivisions (song)
